title: Devfest'18
description: Devfest Algiers 2018 was about “Digital wellbeing”, it was enriched by a Hackathon, workshops and conferences

title: Devfest 2019
description: It was the 8th edition of devfest Algiers. The theme was about D&I 'Diversity and inclusion' a very important culture and principle very essential factor of equality and social cohesion that aims to create a healthy, serene and inclusive work environment.

title: Devfest 2020
description: devfest Algiers 2020 was about 'online safety' and because of the pandemic it was an online event with tracks, panels, equity in tech session by WTM Algiers and a competition
